name: Workhint, Inc.
description: Developer of B2B SaaS solutions intended to help create a matching platform for different business functions. The company's system creates a platform in three steps that are named supply & demand, select request block, and invite users, the whole can be used in different use-cases and functions like advisory, mentorship, telemedicine, freelance management, and part-timers management, enabling organizations to reduce cost, improve productivity, and drive insight-driven decisions.
one_liner: Developer of B2B SaaS solutions intended to help create a matching platform for different business functions. The company's system creates a platform in three steps that are named supply & demand, select request block, and invite users, the whole can be used in different use-cases and functions like advisory, mentorship, telemedicine, freelance management, and part-timers management, enabling organizations to reduce cost, improve productivity, and drive insight-driven decisions.
